    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120227</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120227</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Določite relativno  hitrost čolnov</string>
            <string language="en">Determine the relative velocities of the boats</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie die relativen Geschwindigkeiten der 
Boote fest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminez les vitesses relatives des bateaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determine as velocidades relativas dos barcos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determini le velocità relative delle barche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορίστε τις σχετικές ταχύτητες των βαρκών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determine las velocidades relativas de los 
barcos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Simulicija teka vzdolž brega jezera na katerem se premikata dva čolna.</string>
            <string language="en">Simulation of run along the river bank where two boats are moving with different speed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovalni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">reference frame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Simulation des Durchlaufes entlang der Flußbank,
wohin zwei Boote mit unterschiedlicher Geschwindigkeit bewegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Simulation de passage le long de la banque de 
fleuve où deux bateaux se déplacent avec la vitesse différente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Simulação do funcionamento ao longo do banco do
rio aonde dois barcos se estão movendo com velocidade diferente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simulazione del funzionamento lungo la 
banca del fiume in cui due barche stanno muovendosi con 
velocità differente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσομοίωση του τρεξίματος κατά μήκος της όχθης 
ποταμού όπου δύο βάρκες κινούνται με τη διαφορετική ταχύτητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Simulación del funcionamiento a lo largo de la 
batería del río adonde dos barcos se están moviendo con diversa 
velocidad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bezugsfeld</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trame de référence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">frame da referência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura di riferimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πλαίσιο αναφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
